template.name: Best Visitor Management System | Softhealer Technologies

div.class: oe_structure oe_empty

div.p: A Visitor Management System is a digital solution that helps organizations manage and track visitors who enter their premises, improving security and efficiency.

div.class: row justify-content-center align-items-center
col-xxl-6 col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-10
sh_column_inner_box
col-xxl-6 col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-12 d-flex align-items-center

div.p: Our Visitor Management System provides an efficient and effective way to manage visitors. With this system, you can easily track visitor meetings and the purpose of each visit, including visitor contact details, check-in/out details, visit destination, visit type, visit category, reference name, employee name, and department name. This information is displayed in both tree and form views for easy access. Additionally, you can print a detailed visitor pass for each visitor to ensure maximum security.
